questions.text: Do you primarily develop back-end applications for deployment on cloud platforms or on-premise servers?
What is your favorite programming language?
Have you encountered any challenges in integrating with third-party APIs in the past? If so, what were they?
The world of web development is constantly evolving. How do you stay up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies impacting both front-end and back-end development?

Many full-stack developers choose to specialize in a particular area (e.g., front-end heavy, back-end heavy). Do you have a preference, and if so, how do you stay proficient in the other area to maintain your full-stack skillset?
Beyond technical skills, what soft skills do you consider most important for success as a full-stack developer? Why?
Communication and collaboration are key in full-stack development. Describe a situation where your ability to bridge the gap between front-end and back-end teams proved beneficial to a project.
